* Already done *
 * Use magnetic north sensor
 * Waypoint monitor
 * Track display & recording (use server backend)
 * Route display

* Short-term todo *
 * Edit/Save Routes
 * Gpx import
 * Gauge options (Clock, Altitude, Speed)
 * Multiple datum support: RD, UTM, others (see Proj.4)
 * Better handling of 'bad-weather' scenarios (duplicate names, bad settings, etc)

* Planned features: *
 * Screensaver disable & autodisable
 * Route editing
 * Route & Track monitoring
 * Monitor alarms (ETA too late, out/in range track/route/waypoint, over/under altitude, gaining/losing speed/altitude)

* Future: *
 * Implement client-server model (data handling & track recording in server, rest in client)
 * Create a plugin architecture to enable 3rd party widgets/layouts/events
